verses.kjv: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.
verses.ct: Show me mercy, God, because of your unfailing love. Because your compassion is so abundant, wipe away my rebellious acts.

verses.kjv: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.
verses.ct: Scrub me completely clean from my guilt, and purify me from my sin.

verses.kjv: For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me.
verses.ct: I fully recognize my rebellious acts, and my sin is constantly on my mind.

verses.kjv: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.
verses.ct: Against you — you alone — I have sinned and done what is evil in your sight. So you are completely right when you speak and justified when you pass judgment.

verses.kjv: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
verses.ct: Look, I was born into a world of wrongdoing; from the very moment my mother became pregnant with me, sin was present.

verses.kjv: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.
verses.ct: What you truly want is honesty deep inside a person, and in my innermost being you will teach me wisdom.

verses.kjv: Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.
verses.ct: Cleanse me with hyssop, and I will be pure. Wash me, and I will be whiter than snow.

verses.kjv: Make me to hear joy and gladness; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.
verses.ct: Let me hear joy and celebration again, so that the body you have crushed can rejoice once more.

verses.kjv: Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.
verses.ct: Turn your attention away from my sins, and wipe out every one of my guilty acts.

verses.kjv: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
verses.ct: Create a pure heart in me, God, and renew a steady spirit inside me.

verses.kjv: Cast me not away from thy presence; and take not thy holy spirit from me.
verses.ct: Don't throw me out of your presence, and don't take your Holy Spirit away from me.

verses.kjv: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.
verses.ct: Give me back the joy that comes from your salvation, and sustain me with a willing spirit.

verses.kjv: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.
verses.ct: Then I will show those who rebel against you how to follow your ways, and people trapped in sin will turn back to you.

verses.kjv: Deliver me from bloodguiltiness, O God, thou God of my salvation: and my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness.
verses.ct: Rescue me from the guilt of bloodshed, God — you are the God who saves me — and my tongue will sing out about your righteousness.

verses.kjv: O Lord, open thou my lips; and my mouth shall shew forth thy praise.
verses.ct: Lord, open my lips, and my mouth will declare your praise.

verses.kjv: For thou desirest not sacrifice; else would I give it: thou delightest not in burnt offering.
verses.ct: You don't actually want animal sacrifices — otherwise I would offer them. Burnt offerings don't bring you pleasure.

verses.kjv: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
verses.ct: What God truly values as a sacrifice is a broken spirit. A heart that is broken and filled with remorse — that, God, you will never reject.

verses.kjv: Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion: build thou the walls of Jerusalem.
verses.ct: In your goodness, treat Zion with favor. Rebuild the walls of Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: Then shalt thou be pleased with the sacrifices of righteousness, with burnt offering and whole burnt offering: then shall they offer bullocks upon thine altar.
verses.ct: Then you will take pleasure in proper sacrifices of righteousness — burnt offerings and whole burnt offerings. Then bulls will be offered on your altar.
